argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ofcfval2.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 2 |  | ofcfval2.2 | |- ( ph -> C e. W ) |
| 3 |  | ofcfval2.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. X ) |
| 4 |  | ofcfval2.4 | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> B ) ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. x e. A B e. X ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. A |-> B ) = ( x e. A |-> B ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fnmpt | |- ( A. x e. A B e. X -> ( x e. A |-> B ) Fn A ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) Fn A ) |
| 9 | 4 | #P_fneq1d | |- ( ph -> ( F Fn A <-> ( x e. A |-> B ) Fn A ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) |
| 11 | 4, 3 | #P_fvmpt2d | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( F ` x ) = B ) |
| 12 | 10, 1, 2, 11 | #P_ofcfval | |- ( ph -> ( F oFC R C ) = ( x e. A |-> ( B R C ) ) ) |
